title: Weekly Club Meeting
description: Our regular weekly club meeting with casual games, analysis, and chess puzzles.

title: Spring Championship
description: The semester's main tournament with cash prizes for the top three winners.

title: Chess & Chill
description: A relaxed social event for chess players of all levels. Refreshments provided.

title: Beginner's Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of chess strategy and tactics. Perfect for newcomers and those looking to improve their game.

title: Simultaneous Exhibition
description: Our club president Michael Chen will play against multiple opponents simultaneously. Sign up to test your skills!

title: Chess Movie Night
description: Join us for a screening of 'The Queen's Gambit' followed by a discussion on chess in popular culture.

title: Blitz Tournament
description: Fast-paced chess with 5-minute time controls. Prizes for top performers.

title: End of Semester Party
description: Celebrate the end of the semester with fellow chess enthusiasts. Food and drinks provided.
